text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I arrive at the summer training site<n>together with Special
Week. Once we<n>get there, however...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Blegh... I-it's so hot...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I know I need to do this... in order to<n>win... But it's just way
too hot...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The heat is getting to her head. I need<n>to figure out how to
cheer her up...
choice_data_list:
How about we eat something delicious at the
festival later tonight?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Delicious... festival food?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
They... they have baked potatoes with<n>butter, right?! It's a
festival staple!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yaaay! I think I'm ready to start<n>training! Let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With Special Week all fired up and<n>ready to go, she blasts
through her<n>entire training regimen. Afterwards...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! There are so many different<n>stalls... So many
people too. I don't<n>think I've ever been to such a<n>packed
festival.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Where do we even begin?! Oh, I see a<n>baked potato stall!
Let's start with<n>that!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Phew... That was delicious! Baked<n>potatoes with butter
never disappoint,<n>no matter the festival!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
So where do we go next? That<n>Umamusume sponge cake
over there<n>looks—oh!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Grass and the others are here too!<n>Do you mind if I say hi to
them really<n>quickly?
choice_data_list: Not at all. Take your time.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Thank you! I'll be right back!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: (Thud!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Oops! I'm sorry! I didn't mean to<n>bump—oof! So many
people!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week gets caught in the<n>crowd, unable to move due
to the<n>sheer density of people on the<n>streets.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I lead Special Week down a path that<n>isn't so packed.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Phew! W-we made it! Thanks for<n>saving me back there,
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I will! Hey, Grass! Over heeere!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While I wait for Special Week to finish<n>her business, I decide
to buy some<n>Umamusume sponge cake to try out.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: See ya! ...Sorry to keep you waiting.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wait a second... Sniff... sniff... Ismell something sweet. That bag... Is itwhat I think it is?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yaaay! It's the Umamusume sponge<n>cake!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You got it for me, didn't you?! Oh, you<n>really shouldn't have!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I wanna get you something too! What<n>to get, what to get...
Hm? That stall<n>over there...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! I know just what to give you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Special Week hands me her gift, and<n>we head to the beach
to enjoy each<n>other's treats.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Mmmm... That sponge cake was so<n>good! It took only three
seconds to<n>make it disappear!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Heheh... Adding "Umamusume" to<n>things makes them taste
different<n>somehow! They didn't do stuff like<n>this back
home, that's for sure.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
How about yours? Your shaved ice<n>was made using milk
from Hokkaido!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
That's good! Oh, take your time<n>though. If you eat too much
at once,<n>you'll get brain freeze.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Besides, I want you savor the taste<n>of my hometown!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Come to think of it, why is<n>festival food so good?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I mean... Take yakisoba or baked<n>potatoes, for example.
They're super<n>simple everyday foods! Yet they still<n>
somehow taste absolutely amazing!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
My mom always wondered why too.<n>But... I think I've
figured out the<n>reason why it tastes the way it does.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Festivals are a place of fun and<n>happiness! The food is
amazing<n>because you get to share it with the<n>people you
care about most!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh... I hope my mom's doing<n>okay...
choice_data_list: You sure do miss her a lot, don't you?
You sure do miss her a lot, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Well, yeah... It's hard not to during<n>times like these.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
But those feelings of loneliness and<n>sadness no longer get
to me<n>because...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I love it here! I love spending every<n>day here at Tracen
Academy!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I'm a regular at a ramen shop, I've<n>found new places I love
visiting, and<n>I've made so many close friends!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's probably why the sponge<n>cake tasted so good too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
It took a lot of courage for me to step<n>out of my comfort
zone and come to<n>the academy, but I'm really glad I<n>did—I
was able to find an amazing<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... I'll do my part and try my<n>best to train hard
tomorrow too! Now<n>that I've filled my stomach, all I need<n>
to do is get a good night's rest, and—

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what time is it now?! We have<n>to get back before they
lock us out!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
B-but you aren't done with your<n>shaved ice yet! I want you
to take<n>your time eating such a delicacy...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Maybe if I help you finish the<n>dessert—no, what am I even
saying?!<n>That just makes it look like I want<n>some of your
food!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? R-really? Are you sure?<n>...Yaaaay! Leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: All right, then... I'm digging in! ♪

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Mmmmm! The ice is so crunchy... and<n>delicious!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
The milk... tastes just like the milk... I<n>had back in
Hokkaido—Hawaaaa?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: O-owww... My head... It hurts... Brain...<n>is freezing...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Self-inflicted though the pain may<n>have been, I lend my
shoulder to the<n>ailing Special Week and we somehow<n>
manage to make it back in time.
